title: The Gathering at the Orchid Pavilion
description: landscape with trees, bridges, river and mountains; men and children watching ducks from a bridge and pavillion on stilts over water; three children putting lilypads with cups in the water with four adults behind rock nearby; seated scholars with books and scrolls watching lilypads and cups float down river; larger roup with scribes and attendants seated on both riverbanks; other figures writing and watching river; text at front and back of scroll
